title: Run a Flash Sale on Merchandise
description: To clear out old inventory, a team's marketing department wants to run a 24-hour flash sale on last season's merchandise.

tasks.description: Identify the specific items to be included in the sale.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all items from last season.

tasks.description: Apply a discount to all the selected items in the e-commerce system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies a 50% discount to all sale items.

tasks.description: Announce the flash sale on social media and through an email blast to fans.
